metadata.name: ShadowPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第七步：登陆 Moonriver。镜花水月，有无相生，敢为姊妹链 DeFi 生态之先。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“缤纷月影，潜行待发”状态。This card is issued to commemorate the Seventh step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Moonriver.Moon in the river, like flowers in the mirror, to bring light to the world, she dares to be the first of the sister parachain DeFi ecosystem.Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Moonlight Shadow, Moving Fast Forward".
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
